mapper.select:
select gxhczr as czr, count(*) as sl, t.rwlx as ywlx from rfid_eri_customize_task t, rfid_eri_customize_record r where t.lsh = r.lsh and t.zt = 2 and r.zt = 1
and r.gxhrq >= to_date(#{qsrq}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.wcrq >= to_date(#{qsrq}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and r.gxhrq < to_date(#{zzrq}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1 and t.wcrq < to_date(#{zzrq}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
and r.gxhczr = #{yhdh}
group by r.gxhczr, t.rwlx order by r.gxhczr

select a.*,fc.dmsm1 as cllx from (select rvl.syxz,count(*) as zksl from RFID_ERI re,RFID_VEHICLE_LOG rvl where re.clxxbfid = rvl.id
and upper(rvl.fzjg) like upper(trim(#{fzjg})) || '%'
and re.zt = 1 group by rvl.syxz) a,FRM_CODE fc where trim(fc.dmz) = trim(a.syxz) and fc.xtlb='00' and fc.dmlb='1003'
